Package framework.components.table

Class TableColumn

java.lang.Object
framework.components.JSContainer
framework.components.table.TableColumn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class TableColumn
extends JSContainer
Hold all the information for the definition of a column in a Table
Author:
Kureem Rossaye

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected TableCellRenderer cellRenderer
    The renderer used to draw the data cells of the column.
    protected TableCellRenderer headerRenderer
    The renderer used to draw the header of the column.
    protected java.lang.Object headerValue
    The header value of the column.
    protected java.lang.Object identifier  
    protected int modelIndex
    The index of the column in the model which is to be displayed by this TableColumn.
    protected boolean resizable
    If true, the user is allowed to resize the column; the default is true.

  • Field Details

    • modelIndex

      protected int modelIndex
      The index of the column in the model which is to be displayed by this TableColumn. As columns are moved around in the view modelIndex remains constant.

    • identifier

      protected java.lang.Object identifier

    • headerRenderer

      protected TableCellRenderer headerRenderer
      The renderer used to draw the header of the column.

    • headerValue

      protected java.lang.Object headerValue
      The header value of the column.

    • cellRenderer

      protected TableCellRenderer cellRenderer
      The renderer used to draw the data cells of the column.

    • resizable

      protected boolean resizable
      If true, the user is allowed to resize the column; the default is true.
